verses.name: Mark 4:17
verses.text: And have no root in themselves, and so endure but for a time: afterward, when affliction or persecution ariseth for the word’s sake, immediately they are offended.

verses.name: Mark 4:18
verses.text: And these are they which are sown among thorns; such as hear the word,

verses.name: Mark 4:19
verses.text: And the cares of this world, and the deceitfulness of riches, and the lusts of other things entering in, choke the word, and it becometh unfruitful.

verses.name: Mark 4:20
verses.text: And these are they which are sown on good ground; such as hear the word, and receive it, and bring forth fruit, some thirtyfold, some sixty, and some an hundred.
